titles.title: O Wondrous Type, O Vision Fair

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O wondrous type! O vision fair Of glory that the Church may share, Which Christ upon the mountain shows, where brighter than the sun He glows!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: From age to age the tale declare, How with the three disciples there, Where Moses and Elijah meet, The Lord holds converse high and sweet.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The law and prophets there have place, Two chosen witnesses of grace; The Father's voice from out the cloud proclaims His only Son aloud.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: With shining face and bright array, Christ deigns to manifest today What glory shall be theirs above who joy in God with perfect love.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And faithful hearts are raised on high by this great vision's mystery; For which in joyful strains we raise the voice of prayer, the hymn of praise.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
O Father, with th'Eternal Son,
and Holy Spirit, ever One,
Vouchsafe to bring us by Thy grace
to see Thy glory face to face.
